name: V"AI"entine's Day
description:
(Press any button to advance text, and press space after typing the answer to a question: one-word answers only, please!)

You have joined the special QA testing program for Robolove, Inc.! This testing program doubles as a fast-paced speed dating session. Talk to your robot, ask them questions, and maybe even find the AI of your dreams... Or reject them from both the program and your heart.

(Also, you have to exit the Windows version with Alt-F4 or by closing it from the taskbar. Sorry)
